Acid Spit.name: Acid Spit
Acid Spit.description: The creature has salivary glands which produce a caustic acid.

Acid Spray.name: Acid Spray
Acid Spray.description: The creature has salivary glands which produce a caustic acidic spray.

Amorphous.name: Amorphous
Amorphous.description: The @ref[actor.name]{creature} may move through a space as narrow as 1 inch in diameter without any penalty to its Stride. It is immune to the @Condition[restrained] condition.

Aqueous Transmission.name: Aqueous Transmission
Aqueous Transmission.description: The @ref[name] is able to move instantaneously through water.

Blood Sense.name: Blood Sense
Blood Sense.description:
The @ref[actor.name] is permanently Blinded, but can precisely sense any blooded creature within 20 feet which does not have all its hit points.

Any weapon or skill attack against a wounded creature does not suffer Banes that would normally apply when Blinded.

Cold Absorption.name: Cold Absorption
Cold Absorption.description: The @ref[actor.name]{creature} has an exceptional ability to thrive within frigid environments. Its Cold resistance is doubled and if that resistance would reduce an amount of damage below zero, the negative amount is received as Healing instead.

Corrode Weapon.name: Corrode Weapon
Corrode Weapon.description: The internal corrosive metabolism of the @ref[actor.name]{ooze} threatens to dissolve metal weapons that strike it.

Elusive Flight.name: Elusive Flight
Elusive Flight.description: This @ref[actor.name]{creature} is especially elusive while in flight, able to swoop in and out of combat without provoking any Disengagement. It can be engaged if it lands upon the ground and Disengagement may apply if it attempts to return to flight.

False Appearance.name: False Appearance
False Appearance.description: While it remains motionless, the @ref[actor.name]{creature} is indistinguishable from some other object or material.

Immuntable Form.name: Immuntable Form
Immuntable Form.description: The @ref[actor.name] is immune to any spell or effect which alters its physical form.

Magical Sight.name: Magical Sight
Magical Sight.description: The @ref[actor.name]{creature} has otherworldly sight that makes it especially aware of dangers or opportunities. It gains +2 Boons to any Awareness check and can see @Condition[invisible] creatures.

Multiply.name: Multiply
Multiply.description: The @ref[actor.name]{ooze} grows rapidly, increasing in health and size.

Pack Hunter.name: Pack Hunter
Pack Hunter.description:
This creature is a pack hunter, relying on its allies to flank and harrass a target to render it exposed to further harm.

This creature doubles number of Boons awarded from attacking a Flanked enemy.

Pouncing Strike.name: Pouncing Strike
Pouncing Strike.description: This creature lunges forward, putting its whole weight behind a leaping strike.

Raking Talons.name: Raking Talons
Raking Talons.description: The @ref[actor.name]{creature} attacks rapidly with its talons, dealing multiple raking blows against a single target.

Restraining Chomp.name: Restraining Chomp
Restraining Chomp.description: The @ref[actor.name]{creature} uses its powerful jaws to bite and hold a target with a powerful chomp.

Self-Repair.name: Self-Repair
Self-Repair.description: The @ref[actor.name]{construct} activates internal repairing mechanisms to mitigate damage it has taken.

Slippery Form.name: Slippery Form
Slippery Form.description: This creature is permanently slippery, giving it the ability to elude capture by physical restraints.

Subdivide.name: Subdivide
Subdivide.description: The @ref[actor.name]{ooze} can divide itself into multiple parts, each an independent copy of the original.

Swooping Strike.name: Swooping Strike
Swooping Strike.description: This creature swoops from high above into a diving attack.

Thrash.name: Thrash
Thrash.description: Once the @ref[actor.name]{creature} has an enemy restrained, it will thrash violently dealing terrible blows to the grasped victim.

Tusk Charge.name: Tusk Charge
Tusk Charge.description: The Boar lowers its head and charges with frantic speed, it's tusks protruding from beneath a drooling gullet.

Web Spinner.name: Web Spinner
Web Spinner.description:
The @ref[actor.name]{creature} can create powerfully adhesive webbing. It ignores any movement restrictions or restraints otherwise caused by webbing.

While in contact with a web, the @ref[actor.name]{creature} knows the precise location of any other creature in contact with the same web.
